Items.Title: Roll Call
Invocation
Items.AgendaNote:
Delivered by:  REV. WENDELL FOSTER.

Motion to spread the invocation in full upon the record by COUNCIL MEMBER HENRY.
Items.MinutesNote:
The Invocation was delivered by Rev. Wendell Foster (Council Member 16th CD - The Bronx)

Council Member Henry moved  that the invocation be spread in full upon the Minutes and adopted.

Items.Title: Adoption of Minutes
Items.AgendaNote: Motion that the Minutes of the Stated Meeting of May 23, 2001 be adopted and printed by Council Member Oddo.
Items.MinutesNote: Council Member Robles moved that the Minutes of the Stated Meeting of May 23, 2001 be adopted and printed.

By Council Member Eldridge:
Pursuant to Rule 11.20(b) of the Council and Section 197-d(b)(3) of the New York City Charter, the Council resolves that the action of the City Planning Commission on Uniform Land Use Procedure Application No. 20000550 ZSM, shall be subject to review by the Council.
